CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, 'Super High'), "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, 'High'), "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, 'Regulary'), "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, 'Low'), "https://publicdomainvectors.org/tn_related/DodgerBlue%20Flag%20Waving.webp", "https://static.thenounproject.com/png/1298805-200.png" ) ) ) ), "", 25, 25 )
CustomField.label: Priority Flag
